content: The Man-in-Stone is a character, boss, and later merchant you can meet in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. This character will ask you to retrieve an item from a nearby cave, and if defeated in a fight, will grant you a Transformation Spell, and then begin to sell you items later on.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Man-in-Stone_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Man-in-Stone Questline'.
The content is as follows:
The Man-in-Stone is a character, boss, and later merchant you can meet in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. This character will ask you to retrieve an item from a nearby cave, and if defeated in a fight, will grant you a Transformation Spell, and then begin to sell you items later on.
